content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: snow_block
inventory=[{"type": "magenta_concrete_powder", "quantity": 19, "index": 11}, {"type": "red_concrete", "quantity": 13, "index": 20}, {"type": "cyan_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 20, "index": 23}, {"type": "crimson_sign", "quantity": 2, "index": 24}, {"type": "enchanting_table", "quantity": 39, "index": 27}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 64, "index": 30}, {"type": "snowball", "quantity": 4, "index": 42}, {"type": "gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 55, "index": 43}, {"type": "dark_oak_fence", "quantity": 10, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a snow_block, I need to place 4 snowballs in the crafting grid in a square shape. Therefore, I will start by moving one snowball from slot 42 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 42 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: snow_block
inventory=[{"type": "snowball", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "magenta_concrete_powder", "quantity": 19, "index": 11}, {"type": "red_concrete", "quantity": 13, "index": 20}, {"type": "cyan_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 20, "index": 23}, {"type": "crimson_sign", "quantity": 2, "index": 24}, {"type": "enchanting_table", "quantity": 39, "index": 27}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 64, "index": 30}, {"type": "snowball", "quantity": 3, "index": 42}, {"type": "gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 55, "index": 43}, {"type": "dark_oak_fence", "quantity": 10, "index": 45}]
thought: I have already placed one snowball in slot 1, so I will now move another snowball to slot 2, which is to the right of slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 42 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: snow_block
inventory=[{"type": "snowball", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "snowball", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "magenta_concrete_powder", "quantity": 19, "index": 11}, {"type": "red_concrete", "quantity": 13, "index": 20}, {"type": "cyan_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 20, "index": 23}, {"type": "crimson_sign", "quantity": 2, "index": 24}, {"type": "enchanting_table", "quantity": 39, "index": 27}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 64, "index": 30}, {"type": "snowball", "quantity": 2, "index": 42}, {"type": "gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 55, "index": 43}, {"type": "dark_oak_fence", "quantity": 10, "index": 45}]
thought: I have already placed two snowballs in slots 1 and 2, so I will now move another snowball to slot 4, which is below slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 42 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: snow_block
inventory=[{"type": "snowball", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "snowball", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "snowball", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "magenta_concrete_powder", "quantity": 19, "index": 11}, {"type": "red_concrete", "quantity": 13, "index": 20}, {"type": "cyan_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 20, "index": 23}, {"type": "crimson_sign", "quantity": 2, "index": 24}, {"type": "enchanting_table", "quantity": 39, "index": 27}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 64, "index": 30}, {"type": "snowball", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 55, "index": 43}, {"type": "dark_oak_fence", "quantity": 10, "index": 45}]
thought: I have already placed three snowballs in slots 1, 2, and 4, so I will now move the final snowball to slot 5, which is to the right of slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 42 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: snow_block
inventory=[{"type": "snow_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "snowball", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "snowball", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "snowball", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "snowball", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "magenta_concrete_powder", "quantity": 19, "index": 11}, {"type": "red_concrete", "quantity": 13, "index": 20}, {"type": "cyan_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 20, "index": 23}, {"type": "crimson_sign", "quantity": 2, "index": 24}, {"type": "enchanting_table", "quantity": 39, "index": 27}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 64, "index": 30}, {"type": "gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 55, "index": 43}, {"type": "dark_oak_fence", "quantity": 10, "index": 45}]
thought: I have now crafted a snow_block in the crafting grid, so I will move it to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
